item.rsjukeboxes.block.rsjukeboxes.rs_ju: Basic jukebox which you can turn on by redstone
item.rsjukeboxes.block.rsjukeboxes.repea: Repeats one song if it's powered by redstone
§lWiring:%nl%  Yellow: ON/OFF%nl%  Red: Emits when track ends%nl%  Green: Tick pause delay addition%nl%  Blue: Tick pause delay coefficient%nl%%nl%  §o  delay = Blue*16 + Green
item.rsjukeboxes.block.rsjukeboxes.tier1: Slots: 5%nl%%nl%§lWiring:%nl%  Yellow: Play/Stop%nl%  Red: Emits when track ends%nl%  Green: Previous track%nl%  Blue: Next track
